label: specifiedFacility
comment: A production facility specified for this production process.
A production facility specified for this referenced location.
A production facility specified for this trade party.
A production facility specified for this trade product.

rangeIncludes.comment: A man made physical structure, such as a building, in which something is produced.

domainIncludes.comment: A reference to a physical location or place.
A naturally occurring or designed sequence of operations or events in order to produce something.
An individual, a group, or a body having a role in a trade business function.
Any tangible output or service produced by human or mechanical effort or by a natural process for trade purposes.
